challengeName: CSFV Main Site SEO Implementation Part 1
detailedRequirements:
Project Overview

This project, the CSFV Community Gaming website project will provide the web site infrastructure and integration of the games. This will be a web site that is available on the Internet, and also will be delivered in a form where the server and the games can be installed and used behind a firewall.

The goal of this challenge is to implement part of the provided SEO document in csfv_frontend_module application. The goal is to imrpove SEO for the CSFV websites.

Competition Task Overview

This task is addressing csfv_frontend_module website (http://www.verigames.com).

The main goal is to implement the title, description, keywords metadata sections for static and dynamic pages. Note the following :

  • Meta data

    • For dyanmic pages the title should be retreived from the content title, i.e. news details should read the title from the news cms post title, forums should be the thread title, etc.

    • For dyanmic pages the description should be pulled from the page content. i.e. news details should read the words that combine a 140 characters (it should be split by words)., for forums it should be 140 characters of first post, etc. Write proper helper method that split the description by words where words plus spaces won't exceed 140 characters.

    • No keywords metadata tag for dynamic pages.

Other than what mentioned above, the implementation of the document should be striaghtforward, post in the forums if you have questions about specific things in the required sections of the SEO document or how to address it if it is not clear.

Technology Overview

  • NodeJS 0.10.23
  • Mongo
  • Jade
  • ExpressJS
  • SEO

Github Code

The csfv_frontend_module code is located in http://github.com/topcoderinc/csfv_frontend_module if you cannot access the link (it usually gives you 404 error if you don't have permission) then request access in the challenge forums

Documentation Provided

The SEO Strategy Implementation Document is provided in challenge forums.
